results.text: Some trust in chariots and some in horses, but we trust in the name of the Lord our God.
results.reason: Emphasizes trusting in God over human strength or resources.
results.reflection: Our trust should be in the unchanging and faithful character of God.

results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Encourages complete trust in God's guidance and wisdom.
results.reflection: Trusting God wholeheartedly leads to a straight and purposeful path.

results.text: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
results.reason: Highlights the superiority of trusting in the Lord over relying on people.
results.reflection: God is our ultimate refuge and source of trust, surpassing human limitations.

results.text: Trust in the Lord forever, for the Lord, the Lord himself, is the Rock eternal.
results.reason: Declares the everlasting reliability of God as our foundation.
results.reflection: God is the unchanging Rock on which we can securely place our trust for eternity.

results.text: But blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord, whose confidence is in him.
results.reason: Promises blessings to those who trust in the Lord.
results.reflection: True blessing and security come from placing our confidence and trust in God.
